review: We were looking for the gynaecologist for the birth of our first child, by God grace we met Dr. Gazal Garg. *** ** *** **** ****** she pateintly listens to the parents and understand their problems and politely answers to all their queries. Even at the time of delivery when my wife was going through the labour pain she was the shining light who has given me hope that everything will be normal and their is no need to worry, and not even once she ever thought of delivering baby via c-section. It is her great vision and her's caring nature that when in today's world where doctors try to get the baby delivered via c-section by getting family afraid by any means necessay. She waited for almost 40 hrs for getting my baby delivered via natural delivery process, and now both my wife and baby are fine to which I and my family is indebted to her.

We were looking for the gynaecologist for the birth of our first child, by God grace we met Dr. Gazal Garg. *** ** *** **** ****** she pateintly listens to the parents and understand their problems and politely answers to all their queries. Even at the time of delivery when I was going through the labour pain she was the shining light who has given me hope that I will give birth through normal delivery even though I have conceded the defeat in the process she didn't. Now I have given birth via normal delivery and both my baby and me are fine all thanks to Dr Gazal Garg.
